duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage construction projects for outside plant, inside plant, and Small Cell Network (SCN) on aerial, Utility Pole, and ground facilities.
Oversee DAS and Small Cell projects, including above and below-ground fiber installation, hub construction, node construction, and related utility make-ready.
Attend meetings, participate in vendor selection, and develop customer relationships to influence awarding of service work to the company.
Order and manage equipment and material for projects, ensure project tracking accuracy, and provide direction to general contractors.
Develop proficiency in permitting and licensing processes, ensure awareness of project issues, and serve as an escalation point for corrective actions.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required. Valid driver’s license required.
